roleset.name: to hold by or as if by an anchor or to form an anchor store
roleset.note: ANCHOR-V NOTES: Member of Vncls tape-22.4. (from anchor.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: As there is an effort [*] to `` anchor the dollar '' either to gold or other currencies , the dispute is worth [*]examining [*-1] .
example.arg: either to gold or other currencies

example.name: passive
example.text: [Most]*-1 are anchored [*-1]by a K mart store .
